about_the_game:
Artwork

20 paintings in the game with high resolution without any filtering. The original hand painted artwork awaits you if you enjoy the dark fantasy style.

Music

In .wav format with highest quality. Enjoy the dark atmospheric instrumental music.

You can find the content inside the installation folder.
detailed_description:
Artwork

20 paintings in the game with high resolution without any filtering. The original hand painted artwork awaits you if you enjoy the dark fantasy style.

You can find the content inside the installation folder.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX Mountain Lion (10.8)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or higher

name: Dark Fantasy: Artwork and Music

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Dark Fantasy: Artwork and Music

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or higher
  • Storage: 128 MB available space

short_description: Have the great artwork and music of the game!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
